Job Title: Investment Analyst

Location: New York City Metropolitan Area

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Finance, Sales

Description:
About EEAM
Evolution Environmental Asset Management, LP (“EEAM”) is a US based cutting-edge asset manager at the intersection of traditional investment funds and the environmental markets, powered by an investment team with decades of experience in the environmental markets. EEAM employs carbon finance to help scale up premium climate solutions globally. As seasoned environmental markets pioneers, the team is uniquely qualified to capitalize on emerging environmental opportunities. All investment decisions are guided by a strict best-in-class ESG framework.

Job Description
EEAM is looking for a full time Associate/Analyst to support the growth of the business and its investment process focused on acquiring and trading environmental commodities with high and measurable impacts on sustainable development goals. This role offers the unique opportunity to join a fast-growing and dynamic organization in an exciting and newly created role based in New York City.
Role and Responsibilities
Financial Modeling & Analysis: Construct and refine complex financial models and tools to support EEAM's corporate, trading and sales strategies as well as EEAM’s corporate and fund models.Research & Due Diligence: Assess the financial viability and risks of target companies and projects.Portfolio Management: Help to oversee our project portfolio, fund performance and risk diversification

Qualifications
Experience: 2-5 years in financial modeling with a focus on investment analysis and project finance.Technical Skills: Advanced Excel capabilities are a must. Familiarity with PowerBI or Tableau is highly beneficial.Sector Knowledge: Prior exposure to ESG investing, trading, or carbon markets will set you apart.Certifications: A CFA certification is desirable but not mandatory.Academic: A degree in business, accounting, finance, or a related field. Postgraduate qualifications are a plus.Personal Attributes: An entrepreneurial spirit, adaptability in a start-up environment, and a strong sense of initiative. Passionate about making an environmental and social impact.Communication: Fluency in English with excellent oral and written skills. Additional language abilities are welcome.

EEAM offers you…
Innovative Environment: Join Evolution Environmental Asset Management, LP (EEAM) at the forefront of merging financial acumen with sustainability, where your skills directly shape the business landscape and lay the groundwork for impactful asset management.Professional Growth: Leverage your technical proficiency for more than just number crunching, helping to navigate innovative investment strategies, capitalizing on the complexities of environmental commodities, and accelerating your career in a forward-thinking company committed to a sustainable future.Impact: Join us and become a part of a dynamic team where your work will directly contribute to global decarbonization and sustainability efforts to save the planet for future generations.Dynamic Team: Collaborate with a team that values innovation and technical excellence, where your work is not just about innovative solutions, but about making a real, measurable difference for generations to come.

Experience Level (if available): None
